price: Wͻbεka sε: ”Aane, nokorε sε Kͻkͻbͻni baa yεn hͻ, nanso yԑfaa (asԑm no) atorosԑm, na yεkaa sε: ”Nyankopͻn nsianee hwee (maa obiara); na nokorε sε modeε mowͻ ͻyera kεseε paa mu.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū balā qad jāanā nadhīrun fakadhabnā waqul'nā mā nazzala al-lahu min shayin in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīrin
